ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Carnal pauldrons
ygData.msgSnippet: i got my paladin there at level 5 to loot some =)  if you zone in from lavastorm, all you do is hug left, then up the ramp and first right and you are in the
ygData.messageBody:
i got my paladin there at level 5 to loot some =) if you zone in from
lavastorm, all you do is hug left, then up the ramp and first right and you
are in the king hall. very easy run, and on a weekend or any other night
probably risk-free.

Shada Powa, L56 Wood Elf Troubador
-New owner of Singing Steel BP :)
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr


> Has anyone tried to get these at a low level? Or does anyone
> know SolB well
> enough to say whether a low level could make the dash to loot
> them (and
> survive waiting for them to drop)? Would I need inviso, or
> are there things
> that see through it along the way (on, say a busy weekend night)?
